          <title>
            <string language="en">Compression of gases</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Komprimierung der Gase</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Compactage des gaz</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Compressão dos gáses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Compressione dei gas</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμπίεση των αερίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Compresión de gases</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of two illustrations showing some properties of gases. Shown here is the air is being compressed inside the ball when the pump is being pushed.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">balls</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">compression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">gases</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">properties</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pumps</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von zwei Abbildungen, die 
einige Eigenschaften der Gase zeigen. Hier gezeigt die Luft wird
komprimiert innerhalb der Kugel, wenn die Pumpe gedrückt wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de deux illustrations montrant 
quelques propriétés des gaz. Montré ici est l'air est 
comprimé à l'intérieur de la boule quand la pompe est poussée.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de duas ilustrações que mostram 
algumas propriedades dos gáses. É mostrado aqui o ar está 
sendo comprimido dentro da esfera quando a bomba está sendo 
empurrada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di due illustrazioni che 
mostrano alcune proprietà dei gas. È indicata qui l'aria sta 
comprimenda all'interno della sfera quando la pompa sta spingenda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη δύο απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν μερικές 
ιδιότητες των αερίων. Εμφανισμένος εδώ είναι ο αέρας 
συμπιέζεται μέσα στη σφαίρα όταν ωθείται η αντλία.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de dos ilustraciones que 
muestran algunas características de gases. Se muestra aquí el 
aire se está comprimiendo dentro de la bola cuando se está empujando
la bomba.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kugeln</string>
          </keyword>
